890540.name: Freddy's Journey - Soundtrack
890540.description:
This is the soundtrack to Freddy's Journey.

The soundtrack includes the following songs:


  • Density&Time - Clean Break [02:26]
  • Density&Time - Bird Road [01:43]
  • Density&Time - Dark Cloak [02:20]
  • Density&Time - Stealer [02:33]
  • Density&Time - Venetian [03:01]
  • Density&Time - Voyage [02:37]
  • Alex Ft: Zutsuri & airtone ft.Darkroom - Falling [03:40]
  • Bluemillenium - Welcome in the intox [03:12]
  • Cadmus - 90s Abandoned Manor [01:18]
  • gurdonark Ft: Scomber - Autumn's Dream Lullaby [03:05]
  • Aussens@iter Ft: (Smiling Cynic) - Between Worlds (Instrumental) [02:27]
  • SackJo22 Ft: Helen Money, Gurdonark, Dimitri Artemenko, William Berry, Jovica - The Right Voice [05:11]
  • septahelix - Twilight of the Cinema [05:14]
  • onlymeith - Toward Isolation [05:04]
890540.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
